text: Mark Robert Warner (born December 15, 1954) is an American politician and the senior United States Senator from Virginia, in office since 2009.Hook, Carol S. "10 Things You Didn't Know About Mark Warner." U.S. News & World Report November 5, 2008. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Warner was the 69th Governor of Virginia, holding the office from 2002 to 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== * Senator Mark Warner official U.S. Senate site * Forward Together PAC * * C-SPAN Q&A; interview with Warner, November 6, 2005 * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Virginia Category:Governors of Virginia Category:Politicians from Indianapolis Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Warner
